homePage.title: Welcome to this boilerplate
homePage.subtitle: Your comprehensive platform for managing users and organizations
homePage.description: Streamline your workflow with our powerful user and organization management tools

welcome.subject: Welcome to {appName}!
welcome.title: Welcome to {appName}!
welcome.congratulations: Congratulations! Your email has been verified and your {appName} account is now active. We're excited to have you on board and can't wait to see what you'll build with our platform.
welcome.nextSteps: Here's what you can do next:
welcome.step1: Explore your dashboard - Get familiar with your new workspace
welcome.step2: Set up your profile - Add your information and preferences
welcome.step3: Create your first project - Start building something amazing
welcome.step4: Invite your team - Collaborate with colleagues and friends
welcome.feature1Description: Built for performance with enterprise-grade infrastructure
welcome.feature2Description: Your data is protected with industry-standard security
welcome.feature3Description: Work together seamlessly with real-time collaboration tools
welcome.feature4Description: Track your progress with detailed analytics and reports
welcome.support: Need help getting started? Our support team is here to help! You can reach us anytime, and we typically respond within 24 hours.
welcome.footer: You're receiving this email because you successfully created an account on {appName}. If you have any questions, don't hesitate to reach out to our support team.

verification.subject: Verify your email address
verification.title: Verify your email address
verification.description: To complete your account setup and ensure you receive important updates, please verify your email address by clicking the button below.
verification.alternativeLink: If the button above doesn't work, you can also copy and paste this link into your browser:
verification.linkExpiry: This verification link will expire in {expirationHours} hours for security reasons.
verification.noAccount: If you didn't create an account with {appName}, you can safely ignore this email.
verification.footer: You're receiving this email because someone signed up for {appName} using this email address.

invitation.subject: You've been invited to join {organizationName} on {appName}
invitation.title: You're Invited to Join {organizationName}!
invitation.invitedBy: {inviterName} ({inviterEmail}) has invited you to join {organizationName} as a {role} on {appName}.
invitation.description: Join thousands of users who are already using {appName} to streamline their workflow and boost productivity.
invitation.alternativeLink: If the button above doesn't work, copy and paste this link into your browser:
invitation.linkExpiry: This invitation link will expire in 7 days.
invitation.footer: If you did not expect this invitation, you can safely ignore this email.

passwordReset.subject: Reset your password
passwordReset.title: Reset your password
passwordReset.description: We received a request to reset your password. To proceed, please click the button below.
passwordReset.alternativeLink: If the button above doesn't work, you can also copy and paste this link into your browser:
passwordReset.linkExpiry: This password reset link will expire in 24 hours for security reasons.
passwordReset.noRequest: If you didn't request a password reset, you can safely ignore this email.
passwordReset.footer: You're receiving this email because someone requested a password reset for your {appName} account.

subscription.subject: Your {appName} subscription is now active!
subscription.title: Your Subscription is Active!
subscription.confirmation: Great news! Your subscription to {planName} has been successfully activated. You now have access to all premium features and can make the most of your {appName} experience.
subscription.step1: Explore premium features - Unlock the full potential of your account
subscription.step2: Set up integrations - Connect with your favorite tools and services
subscription.step3: Customize your workspace - Tailor the experience to your needs
subscription.step4: Manage your subscription - View billing details and update preferences
subscription.feature1Description: Get detailed insights and reports to track your progress
subscription.feature2Description: Receive faster response times and dedicated assistance
subscription.feature3Description: Connect with enterprise tools and custom workflows
subscription.feature4Description: Enhanced team features and unlimited collaborators
subscription.billingInfo: Your subscription will automatically renew on your next billing date. You can manage your subscription, update payment methods, or cancel anytime from your account dashboard.
subscription.footer: You're receiving this email because you successfully subscribed to a plan on {appName}. If you have any questions about your subscription, please don't hesitate to contact our support team.

errors.contactSupport: Contact support if the problem persists

organization.description: Create your initial organization to get started with the platform.

validation.slugFormat: Slug can only contain lowercase letters, numbers, and hyphens

errors.slugVerificationFailed: Failed to verify slug availability. Please try again.
errors.slugTaken: This slug is already taken. Please choose a different one.
errors.unexpectedError: An unexpected error occurred. Please try again.

authUI.DELETE_ORGANIZATION_INSTRUCTIONS: Enter the organization slug to continue:
authUI.DELETE_ORGANIZATION_DESCRIPTION: Permanently remove your organization and all of its contents. This action is not reversible ‚Äî please continue with caution.
authUI.ACCEPT_INVITATION_DESCRIPTION: You have been invited to join an organization.
authUI.PENDING_INVITATIONS_DESCRIPTION: Manage pending invitations to your organization.
authUI.UPDATE_ROLE_DESCRIPTION: Update the role for this member
authUI.INVITE_MEMBER_DESCRIPTION: Send an invitation to add a new member to your organization.
authUI.MEMBERS_INSTRUCTIONS: Invite new members to your organization.
authUI.MEMBERS_DESCRIPTION: Add or remove members and manage their roles.
authUI.REMOVE_MEMBER_CONFIRM: Are you sure you want to remove this member from the organization?
authUI.LEAVE_ORGANIZATION_SUCCESS: You have successfully left the organization.
authUI.LEAVE_ORGANIZATION_CONFIRM: Are you sure you want to leave this organization?

authUI.LOGO_INSTRUCTIONS: A logo is optional but strongly recommended.

authUI.SESSION_NOT_FRESH: Your session is not fresh. Please sign in again.
authUI.VERIFY_YOUR_EMAIL_DESCRIPTION: Please verify your email address. Check your inbox for the verification email. If you haven't received the email, click the button below to resend.
authUI.USERNAME_DESCRIPTION: Enter the username you want to use to log in.
authUI.TWO_FACTOR_TOTP_LABEL: Scan the QR Code with your Authenticator

authUI.TWO_FACTOR_DISABLE_INSTRUCTIONS: Please enter your password to disable 2FA.
authUI.TWO_FACTOR_CARD_DESCRIPTION: Add an extra layer of security to your account.
authUI.TWO_FACTOR_DESCRIPTION: Please enter your one-time password to continue
authUI.SECURITY_DESCRIPTION: Manage your security settings and preferences.
authUI.CHANGE_PASSWORD_DESCRIPTION: Update your password to keep your account secure.
authUI.SIGN_OUT_ALL_DEVICES_DESCRIPTION: Sign out of all devices except this one.
authUI.SIGN_OUT_ALL_DEVICES_SUCCESS: Signed out of all devices successfully
authUI.SIGN_OUT_ALL_DEVICES_CONFIRM: Are you sure you want to sign out of all devices?

authUI.SIGN_OUT_CONFIRM: Are you sure you want to sign out?
authUI.SIGN_IN_DESCRIPTION: Enter your credentials to sign in to your account.
authUI.SIGN_UP_DESCRIPTION: Create an account to get started.
authUI.SETTINGS_DESCRIPTION: Manage your account settings and preferences.
authUI.SESSIONS_DESCRIPTION: Manage your active sessions and devices.
authUI.SESSIONS_REVOKE_CONFIRM: Are you sure you want to revoke this session?
authUI.SESSIONS_REVOKE_ALL_CONFIRM: Are you sure you want to revoke all sessions?
authUI.PASSKEY_DESCRIPTION: Use your device's biometric authentication or security key.
authUI.PASSKEY_NOT_SUPPORTED: Passkeys are not supported on this device
authUI.PASSKEY_DELETE_CONFIRM: Are you sure you want to delete this passkey?
authUI.PASSKEY_LIST_DESCRIPTION: Manage your passkeys for secure authentication.
authUI.FORGOT_PASSWORD_DESCRIPTION: Enter your email address and we'll send you a link to reset your password.
authUI.RESET_PASSWORD_INSTRUCTIONS: Check your email for password reset instructions.
authUI.EMAIL_VERIFICATION_INSTRUCTIONS: Check your email for verification instructions.
authUI.PASSWORD_REQUIREMENTS: Password must be at least 8 characters long
authUI.EMAIL_INVALID: Please enter a valid email address
authUI.PRIVACY_REQUIRED: You must accept the privacy policy
authUI.USER_ALREADY_HAS_PASSWORD: User already has a password set

authUI.YOU_ARE_NOT_ALLOWED_TO_DELETE_USERS: You are not allowed to delete users

authUI.TOO_MANY_ATTEMPTS_REQUEST_NEW_CODE: Too many attempts, request new code

authUI.SIGN_UP_EMAIL: Check your email for the verification link.
authUI.SIGN_IN_USERNAME_DESCRIPTION: Enter your username or email below to login to your account
authUI.DELETE_API_KEY_CONFIRM: Are you sure you want to delete this API key?
authUI.RECOVER_ACCOUNT_DESCRIPTION: Please enter a backup code to access your account
authUI.PROVIDERS_DESCRIPTION: Connect your account with a third-party service.
authUI.ORGANIZATION_SLUG_DESCRIPTION: This is your organization's URL namespace.
authUI.ORGANIZATION_NAME_DESCRIPTION: This is your organization's visible name.
authUI.CREATE_API_KEY_SUCCESS: Please copy your API key and store it in a safe place. For security reasons we cannot show it again.
authUI.CREATE_API_KEY_DESCRIPTION: Enter a unique name for your API key to differentiate it from other keys.
authUI.API_KEYS_INSTRUCTIONS: Generate API keys to access your account programmatically.
authUI.API_KEYS_DESCRIPTION: Manage your API keys for secure access.
authUI.PASSKEYS_INSTRUCTIONS: Securely access your account without a password.

authUI.NAME_DESCRIPTION: Please enter your full name, or a display name.

authUI.EMAIL_VERIFY_CHANGE: Please check your email to verify the change.

authUI.DISABLED_CREDENTIALS_DESCRIPTION: Choose a provider to login to your account
authUI.DELETE_ACCOUNT_VERIFY: Please check your email to verify the deletion of your account.
authUI.DELETE_ACCOUNT_INSTRUCTIONS: Please confirm the deletion of your account. This action is not reversible, so please continue with caution.
authUI.DELETE_ACCOUNT_DESCRIPTION: Permanently remove your account and all of its contents. This action is not reversible, so please continue with caution.
authUI.BACKUP_CODES_DESCRIPTION: Save these backup codes in a secure place. You can use them to access your account if you lose your two-factor authentication method.
authUI.AVATAR_INSTRUCTIONS: An avatar is optional but strongly recommended.
authUI.AVATAR_DESCRIPTION: Click on the avatar to upload a custom one from your files.
authUI.ACCOUNTS_INSTRUCTIONS: Sign in to an additional account.
